generate.title: AI Image Generator
generate.subtitle: Create stunning images from text descriptions using AI

tips.tip1: Be specific and descriptive in your prompts
tips.tip2: Include details about style, mood, and composition
tips.tip4: Use negative prompts to exclude unwanted elements
tips.tip5: DALL-E 3 produces higher quality images than DALL-E 2
tips.tip6: Experiment with different prompts to find what works best

form.prompt_placeholder: Be specific and descriptive for best results
